website_summaries.verdict: The Nike Air Foamposite One is not an affordable shoe, but it does make up for it with comfort and an arresting design.It feels perfectly snug and cozy on the feet. Regular sneaker fans may find it a bit expensive, but with exceptional ankle support and vibrant colorways, the sneaker still seems like a good deal.
pros: Based on a majority of reviews, people admire how comfortable the Nike Air Foamposite One feels on the feet
Many have stated how stylish they thought the shoe was, with one buyer saying that the shoe was a definite eye-catcher
Some testers have reported that the shoe gives excellent ankle support
Several consumers say that the colors look much more vibrant in person, especially under the sunlight
A few people have observed that the Air Foamposite One’s sole has good traction
One user thinks the metallic red colorway is ‘dope’ while another has mentioned the goldposite colorway as a head-turner
A number of those who reviewed the shoe are pleased that it is easy to clean
A couple of individuals state that the 3M laces were the ‘cherry on top’ of an already good thing
cons: The breathability factor of the Foamposite One from Nike has received many negative feedbacks
Several testers feel that the shoe is too heavy
Some consumers note that the shoes are quite expensive

customer_reviews.title: These are my favorite pair of shoes I own
customer_reviews.text: These are my favorite pair of shoes I own, the Island greens are an awesome colorway, foamposite sneakers are super comfortable. They do tend to run small for most people so I recommend going a full size up ( I am usually a size 12 but purchases these in a size 13 and they fit perfectly) if you're struggling to decide of you want to buy these like I was, do yourself a favor and get them, you won't regret it.

customer_reviews.title: These are Awesome Foamposites
customer_reviews.text: These are the real deal and perfect. This is my 2nd pair of foamposites pros from this seller and as the last pair these are exceptional. Foamposites fit snug and it’s recommended to get them 1/2 size bigger I wear an 11 so I ordered an 11.5. When I go anywhere these foams are an eye catcher because the colors pop. Go ahead and get you a pair this seller is 100.

RETURNED, NOT PAYING FULL PRICE FOR SOMETHING THAT'S DEFINITELY NOT NEW. BOUGHT NEW FROM FLIGHT CLUB FOR THE SAME PRICE. GIVING 2 STARS BECAUSE IT WAS AUTHENTIC.

customer_reviews.text: I bought the black & orange foamposite & they were trash was really disappointed. Shoes had glue showing on outside on shoe, loose stitching, and didn’t fit like they should. I’ve bought foams for the past couple years and I’ve never had a pair in this condition sold to me, I sent it back within an hour of it getting here. Check your product before mailing it because I wasted my money & waited for them to come in the mail for nothing.
